meanings.definition: A distinctive attribute or aspect of something.
meanings.sent1: The most important feature of the new phone is its large screen.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful garden is a lovely feature of the house.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot became a surprising feature of the quiet library.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a shining feature in a world full of selfishness.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the car made it a standout feature on the road.

meanings.definition: A prominent or distinctive part of a landscape or building.
meanings.sent1: The towering mountain is a striking feature of the landscape.
meanings.sent2: The intricate carvings on the cathedral are a notable feature.
meanings.sent3: The tiny squirrel made the giant oak tree look like a funny feature in the park.
meanings.sent4: The old lighthouse stood as a guiding feature for ships in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The sparkling fountain was the most eye-catching feature in the garden.

meanings.definition: To give special prominence to something in a film or broadcast.
meanings.sent1: The director decided to feature the talented young actress in the lead role.
meanings.sent2: The news program will feature a special report on climate change tonight.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a talking dog as a hilarious surprise.
meanings.sent4: The magazine cover featured a famous singer in a stunning outfit.
meanings.sent5: The documentary will feature rare footage of the endangered species.

meanings.definition: To have as a prominent or distinctive part.
meanings.sent1: The new car model will feature advanced safety features.
meanings.sent2: The renovated house will feature a modern kitchen with all the latest appliances.
meanings.sent3: The play will feature a surprise guest appearance by a famous actor.
meanings.sent4: The art exhibition will feature paintings by local artists.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show will feature designs inspired by nature.
